q.quote: Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together.
q.author: James Cash Penney

q.quote: Forgiveness says you are given another chance to make a new beginning.
q.author: Desmond Tutu

q.quote: To reminisce with my old friends, a chance to share some memories, and play our songs again.
q.author: Ricky Nelson

q.quote: Every year on your birthday, you get a chance to start new.
q.author: Sammy Hagar

q.quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and diligence.
q.author: Abigail Adams

q.quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
q.author: Theodore Roosevelt

q.quote: Tea time is a chance to slow down, pull back and appreciate our surroundings.
q.author: Letitia Baldrige

q.quote: I don't want to miss out on the chance of having a good time.
q.author: Victor Webster

q.quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
q.author: Duke Ellington

q.quote: The risk of a wrong decision is preferable to the terror of indecision.
q.author: Maimonides

q.quote: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
q.author: Maimonides

q.quote: Just keep taking chances and having fun.
q.author: Garth Brooks

q.quote: I shall allow no man to belittle my soul by making me hate him.
q.author: Booker T. Washington

q.quote: When angry, count to four; when very angry, swear.
q.author: Mark Twain
